pullRequest.title: KAFKA-9439: add KafkaProducer API unit tests
pullRequest.bodyText:
This PR adds unit tests for KafkaProducer.close(), KafkaProducer.abortTransaction(), and KafkaProducer.flush().
Increase KafkaProducer JUnit code coverage from 82% methods, 82% lines to 87% methods, 85% lines.
Committer Checklist (excluded from commit message)

 Verify design and implementation
 Verify test coverage and CI build status
 Verify documentation (including upgrade notes)

nodes.bodyText: Could we add some async send calls before the flush, and check whether they are delivered afterwards?
Why do we need to set MAX_BLOCK_MS_CONFIG?

commit.message: update testFlush and testAbortTransaction, add closeWithNegativeTimestampShouldThrow

nodes.bodyText: nit: make the test name more descriptive, like testFlushCompleteSendOfInflightRecords
